Description.Details: Counter Missile Systems are build upon the same principle as an AMS, utilizing a smart warhead that gets into the path of a incoming salvo and detonate there. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: SRM Ammo
